Post 3977
**Fire Lizard - Neutral (Chaos)**
*Hiss.*
Attack: None (Basic) | Defense: None
Abilities:
- Scorch two players at night. Their visit cannot fail and given Protection immunity.
Attributes:
- Roleblock immunity
- If this role spawns, an (3976) Ice Lizard must spawn.
- If you visit an (3976) Ice Lizard, you will be notified.
- You can only be killed by Basic attacks.
- If all (3976) Ice Lizards die, you will additionally deal a Basic attack to your targets and gain an NK win condition.
